mapper.sql: id, role_name, role_code, description, status, sort_order, remark, create_time, update_time, create_by, update_by, is_deleted
mapper.select: SELECT FROM sys_role WHERE role_code = #{roleCode} AND is_deleted = 0

SELECT r.id, r.role_name, r.role_code, r.description, r.status, r.sort_order, r.remark, r.create_time, r.update_time, p.id as permission_id, p.permission_name, p.permission_code, p.permission_type, p.permission_path, p.parent_id, p.icon, p.description as permission_description, p.status as permission_status, p.sort_order as permission_sort_order FROM sys_role r LEFT JOIN sys_role_permission rp ON r.id = rp.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_permission p ON rp.permission_id = p.id WHERE r.id = #{roleId} AND r.is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY p.sort_order ASC

SELECT r.id, r.role_name, r.role_code, r.description, r.status, r.sort_order, r.remark, r.create_time, r.update_time FROM sys_role r INNER JOIN sys_user_role ur ON r.id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND r.is_deleted = 0 AND r.status = 1 ORDER BY r.sort_order ASC
SELECT FROM sys_role WHERE status = 1 AND is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY sort_order ASC
SELECT FROM sys_role WHERE role_code IN #{roleCode} AND is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY sort_order ASC
SELECT COUNT(1) > 0 FROM sys_role WHERE role_code = #{roleCode} AND is_deleted = 0
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM sys_user_role ur INNER JOIN sys_user u ON ur.user_id = u.id WHERE ur.role_id = #{roleId} AND u.is_deleted = 0

SELECT FROM sys_role WHERE is_deleted = 0 AND (role_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR role_code LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR description LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')) AND status = #{status} ORDER BY sort_order ASC, create_time DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_role_permission (role_id, permission_id, create_time, create_by) VALUES (#{roleId}, #{permissionId}, NOW(), 'system')
